mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.supplier_no AS "supplierNo", a.logo_picture_url AS "logoPictureUrl", a.description AS "description", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.version AS "version"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO supplier( id, name, supplier_no, logo_picture_url, description, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, version ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{supplierNo}, #{logoPictureUrl}, #{description}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{version} )
mapper.update: UPDATE supplier SET name = #{name}, supplier_no = #{supplierNo}, logo_picture_url = #{logoPictureUrl}, description = #{description}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, version = #{version} WHERE id = #{id}
